dcterms:description: A resource for therapeutic biomarker discovery in cancer cells, providing genomic data related to drug sensitivity.
dcterms:title: Genomics of Drug Sensitivity in Cancer (GDSC)

dcterms:description: A classical drug response dataset used for validating drug response prediction methods.

dcterms:description: Enables predictive modeling of anticancer drug sensitivity through a comprehensive collection of cancer cell line data.
dcterms:title: CCLE (Cancer Cell Line Encyclopedia)
